'''Gundahad Bolger''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Gundahad was the youngest son of [[Gundolpho Bolger]] and [[Alfrida of the Yale]]. He had one son, [[Gundabald Bolger|Gundabald]].<ref>{{App|Bolger}}</ref>

== Etymology ==
''Gundahad'' is an Old German name, derived from the elements ''gunda'' "war" and ''hadu'' "battle, combat".
